content: Integrated Solutions gross profit of $23.1 million was up 9% with gross margin 49.6% down versus the previous year, primarily driven by the growth of certain large ISV partners and Paragon. Your line is open. Your line is open. Good morning, Jeff and Glenn. Look, I think we really focused on improving our tax rates with our large ISV partners, as we look back a few years and it's working right, we're seeing great attach rates and are selling to what usually are used to be more card focused sales is now really with that ACH offering. Your line is open. I think, yeah, similar to Jeff, I would just add, we made a conscious and deliberate decision this year to invest a little bit more, so what gives me comfort is, we're expanding that bottom line about the same rate as revenue for this quarter, but that was with these conscious decisions to invest in certain areas, meaning or said another way, like we're not feeling pressure from an inflation or wage side or anything like that. Your line is open. Good morning, Jeff and Glenn. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
